value.title: Hyundai DAL-e AI-powered robot provides automated customer service
value.excerpt: Automaker Hyundai has a new employee working in one of its showrooms in Seoul, Korea. The employee is an AI-powered automated robot called DAL-e that provides customer services at the showroom.

value.title: Designing customized "brains" for robots
value.excerpt: MIT researchers have developed an automated way to design customized hardware that speeds up a robot's operation. The system, called robomorphic computing, accounts for the robot's physical layout in suggesting an optimized hardware architecture.

value.title: ZIM cooperation network on AI-based agricultural robotics launched: Artificial intelligence for sustainable agriculture
